name: Double Agent (itch) (duendue, MagnusJMJ, TroldeAnsigt)
description:
Double Agent

A double agent has infiltrated the embassy! You must stop them from ruining the negotiations. Your task is to point out who the double agent is, before they sabotage all their targets.

Controls

Use W-A-S-D to move around. Use the "E"-Key to interact with NPC's and some points of interest in the environment.

Made by:

MagnusJMJ: https://itch.io/profile/magnusjmj

TroldeAnsigt: https://itch.io/profile/troldeansigt

Duendue: https://itch.io/profile/duendue

This was the first full game we made, in an attempt to learn more about collaborating in a project.

The game was made for The Historically Accurate Game Jam 3: https://itch.io/jam/historically-accurate-3
